title: My Girlfriend is the Cutest in the World - Novel Updates
tags: Absent Parents   Beautiful Female Lead   Charismatic Protagonist   College/University   Cute Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Easy Going Life   Female Protagonist   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heartwarming   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Naive Protagonist   Popular Love Interests
author: Che Li Jiu   车厘酒
description:
One day, his roommates were discussing what type of girls were the cutest.

Su Lin didn’t speak a word from beginning to end. He waited for them to finish then snickered disdainfully, “By your standards, slightly pretty and dumb little dwarves are considered cute.”

—

Later, he went to the French department for an elective class and got poked in the back.

Turning around, he saw a little girl.

Big eyes, white skin, pretty and tiny. She looked…. s*upidly cute.

Lu Yuanyuan looked at the guy’s handsome face and carefully asked, “Classmate, excuse me, can you let me through?”

The voice was very small, the tone matching the person, soft and sticky.

….. So f*cking cute.

Su Lin’s heart was about to jump out of his chest.

He suppressed his emotions and said: “Okay, tell me your name first.”>
